WRITING.TITLE: Don't you fucking hate it when someone asks you for a favor and... You say yes, they love you; you say no, they talk smack.
WRITING.TEXT:
"Bro can I have a lift?" "Nah I can't this time." "Why not?" (At this point I think less of the person, I shouldn't have to provide a reason) "I have to be home ASAP, sorry."
And then they think of me as less of a friend for the next two days or however long it seems.
"Dude come to school earlier tomorrow morning; I hate sitting alone at a lunch table waiting for classes to start." "Sorry man I need as much sleep as possible. No can do." "Fuck off then."
If that "fuck off" is supposed to be interpreted as a joke, then it's a horrendous one. What the fuck.
Am I doing something wrong?
Bonus question: how do you refuse to lift someone if you feel like they take advantage of you?
I'm 18/male, not that it matters. I just feel the need to mention it every time I post something here.
Thank you!

WRITING.TITLE: 4 months old puppy crying after shots.
WRITING.TEXT:
He was fine for about two hours when we returned from the vet. After waking up from a nap, he cries at every slight movement (he got vaccinated on his back).
The majority of the time, he'a not moving, just sleeping. But when he does move, he cried and barks a lit.
I read up on other forums. Apparently, it's normal behavior, but I'm worried. Should I take him to an emergency clinic?
Edit: He's awake now just sitting in a corner, but he's not willing to move. He's just staring at his surroundings.
Edit 2: Now we got guests over and he's jumping on them from excitement, crying at the same time from the pain. Should we place him in his crate?

Temporary attribute boosts exist

When you win the finals, you'll go in the offseason and the owner will tell you to release Karl Malone cuz he's unhappy with the team. That'll get you 100 VC. Then you can quit and delete the file.
It's a 10 minute timer to get VC again. I usually wait about 7 minutes, because by the time I reach my first goal, about 3 minutes will have passed already in my case.

Once you sim a season, go to Xbox One home and quit the game, and launch it back up. For some reason, even if you delete the file and start up another one immediately, it won't give you the same goals, unless you quit and restart.

WRITING.TITLE: Is there a way to prevent stupid trades in MyCareer?
WRITING.TEXT:
In my first MyCareer, I was drafted 5th by the Suns. We traded every one of our good ayers: Dragic, Bledsoe, Gerald Green, Channing Frye, Shannon Brown.
What we got in return were David West, Taj Gibson, Andre Miller and some picks.
I'm a few games away from the playoffs, but it's so boring playing games where I'm the only guy on my team who shoots jumpshots. No one else shoots. I tried playing a Rookie casual game and I could only get 5 assists. I'm a pass first PG who plays 41 minutes. We're running Gibson at the 3 for crying out loud.
I made a new MyCareer where I went to the Pistons at 8th. Right now, I'm 20 games in. We haven't made any trades so far. What can I do to keep my team the way it is?
http://www.operationsports.com/forums/nba-2k-next-gen/698150-vc-farm-while-waiting-things-stabilize.html

If you're on PS4, click on this link and follow the instructions OP says http://www.operationsports.com/forums/nba-2k-next-gen/698150-vc-farm-while-waiting-things-stabilize.html
If you're on Xbox One, I'll save you the time of searching on that thread. Download a roster from the servers called "VC Thunderr" (yes with two R's, no quotation marks). Select OKC as your team. Then just spam A. Press conference? Spam A. When the scout talks to you, select "Scout always handle" and he won't bother you anymore. When the coach comes to discuss a strategy for an upcoming games (will happen 2-3 times), do whatever. Go through the season and through the playoffs, this will get you 1550 VC. Then, the owner will ask you to release Karl Malone, that will get you 100 VC.
When you're done, wait 6-7 minutes before you redo, or else you won't get the VC. Also, quit the game and restart it to get the same goals, and in turn to get the same amount of VC.

If you're on PS4, click on this link and follow the instructions OP says http://www.operationsports.com/forums/nba-2k-next-gen/698150-vc-farm-while-waiting-things-stabilize.html
If you're on Xbox One, I'll save you the time of searching on that thread. Download a roster from the servers called "VC Thunderr" (yes with two R's, no quotation marks). Select OKC as your team. Then just spam A. Press conference? Spam A. When the scout talks to you, select "Scout always handle" and he won't bother you anymore. When the coach comes to discuss a strategy for an upcoming games (will happen 2-3 times), do whatever. Go through the season and through the playoffs, this will get you 1550 VC. Then, the owner will ask you to release Karl Malone, that will get you 100 VC.
When you're done, wait 6-7 minutes before you redo, or else you won't get the VC. Also, quit the game and restart it to get the same goals, and in turn to get the same amount of VC.

You're on PS4, so follow this link and voila
http://www.operationsports.com/forums/nba-2k-next-gen/698150-vc-farm-while-waiting-things-stabilize.html

WRITING.TITLE: I am not suicidal, but I don't know how to make suicidal people feel better. Help please, some details inside.
WRITING.TEXT:
I have a friend. He's 18, soon 19, like me. He has been depressed for a long time now. I will make this short.
He had a girlfriend who he wanted to break up with. When he did (in person IIRC) she threatened suicide. Well, him feeling guilty, they got back together. He was still never happy with her. I advised him to break up because I knew she's never go through with suicide.
He did, got another girlfriend, got dumped by her. Started texting me endlessly saying he wants to kill himself because he now has nothing in his life. I was hanging out with him at the time, so we saw each other often.
He got back together with his older girlfriend, the one who wanted to kill herself.
So the school semester starts. We have no classes together so we just gradually lost contact over time. I didn't hear much from him.
Fast forward to recently, ANOTHER semester starts, out last one. Started Monday last week. After not seeing him at all for the first week at school, I texted him because I was worried.
He is now on medication, getting treated for severe depression and ADHD. He got "temporarily dumped" by his girlfriend (the suicide one) because his sadness is destroying the time they spend together. His family "hates" him even more than they used to apparently because he's sadder than ever and he's a drag. They've never really supported him well emotionally from what I've heard. He used to be suicidal; I don't know if he is now, but I'm worried.
Help. What can I say over a text message that can make him feel better? He constantly puts himself down, I try to lift him up, but he refuses anything I say. Understandably of course, depression does that to people.
Thank you in advance.
We get it...

Hahahah I wouldn't know how to photoshop a friend's face on a pornstar's body anyway. And if their photos ever don't do the trick, I got lots of videos of actual look alike pornstars. They're great for backup.
Also, I believe your story, but I refuse to believe anyone is naive enough to think a virus can do such thing.
